# Evocation (Staff)
## Overview
**Aura** strong evocation; **CL** 13th

**Slot** none

**Price** 82,000 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

This smooth hickory or yew staff allows use of the following spells:

- *[[Fireball (Spell)|Fireball]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Magic Missile (Spell)|Magic missile]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Shatter (Spell)|Shatter]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Ice Storm (Spell)|Ice storm]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Wall of Force (Spell)|Wall of force]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Chain Lightning (Spell)|Chain lightning]]* (3 charges)

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Staff (Feat)|Craft Staff]]*, [[Chain Lightning (Spell)|chain lightning]], [[Fireball (Spell)|fireball]], [[Ice Storm (Spell)|ice storm]], [[Magic Missile (Spell)|magic missile]], [[Shatter (Spell)|shatter]], [[Wall of Force (Spell)|wall of force]]*

**Cost** 41,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 493
